# CSPARK — AI CV Builder & Multi-Platform Job Search
# https://www.cspark.app

## Overview
CSPARK is an AI-powered CV builder and multi-platform job search tool. It helps job seekers
create highly targeted, ATS-optimized CVs by matching their profile against real job listings
fetched from LinkedIn, Workday, and CareerOne — powered by Meta Llama 3.3 70B.

## Core Capabilities

### Job Search
- Real-time job search across LinkedIn, Workday, and CareerOne
- Filter by keyword, location, and platform
- Analyze job descriptions for key requirements and skills

### AI CV Optimization
- Section-by-section CV rewriting to match job requirements
- ATS keyword density optimization
- Side-by-side diff preview before saving changes
- Powered by Meta Llama 3.3 70B (via Groq API)

### CV Management
- Create multiple CV versions for different roles
- Import existing CVs (PDF, Word formats)
- Live editor with templates
- PDF export, shareable links, QR codes

### Application Tracking
- Track jobs applied to
- Status management (applied, interview, rejected, offer)

## Pricing

### Free Tier
- 1 CV creation
- 1 CV import
- 1 AI optimization
- 1 job search (up to 25 results)
- LinkedIn platform only
- 7-day shareable links

### Pro ($19.99/month or $199.99/year)
- Unlimited CV creations
- Unlimited CV imports
- Unlimited AI optimizations
- Unlimited job searches across all platforms
- LinkedIn, Workday, and CareerOne access
- Permanent shareable links + QR codes
- Priority processing and support

### Add-on Packs (from $9.99)
- Pay-per-use credit packs for specific features

## Technical Stack
- Frontend: Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- AI: Meta Llama 3.3 70B (via Groq), Gemini (fallback)
- Database & Auth: Supabase
- Payments: Stripe
- Hosting: Vercel

## Target Users
- Job seekers applying to multiple roles across platforms
- Career changers needing a tailored CV per industry
- High-volume applicants who need fast, accurate CV adaptation
- Professionals targeting ATS-first hiring pipelines
